Parameters:
sourceType - The type of the source.
sourceID - The id of the source.
errorType - The type of the error.
errorMessage - The errormessage.
grade - The grade of the error.

error

public void error(ITaskPart t,
                  java.lang.Exception e)
Description copied from interface: IErrorHandler
Handles an error.

A error is usualy unexpected and interupts the program, which need further processing, if it should resume its work or not.

Specified by:
error in interface IErrorHandler
Parameters:
t - The source of the error.
e - The Exception which caused the error.

                  java.lang.Exception e)
Description copied from interface: IErrorHandler
Handles a fatal error.

A fatal error is usualy unrecoverable an interupts the program immediately.

Specified by:

Parameters:
t - The source of the fatal error.
